preference.name: WsoInsertSelectionsPref
preference.preference_description: When a new object is created, which folders/objects should have a reference to it. Valid values are 1/3/4. 1 - All selected Folders. 3 - Newstuff folder. 4 - None (place in database, but with no references to it).
